data.title: UpToDate: Trusted, evidence-based solutions for modern healthcare
data.meta_description: Evidence-based clinical solutions from UpToDate are trusted by clinicians, professionals, and healthcare enterprises worldwide to enable the best possible care decisions and improve health outcomes.
data.text:
Leading clinical solutions for individuals, groups, and enterprises

Explore our professional- and enterprise-focused suites of evidence-based, expert solutions consisting of UpToDate®, UpToDate® Lexidrug™ (formerly Lexicomp®), UpToDate Patient and Member Engagement (formerly Emmi®), and UpToDate Digital Architect.

Recognized for excellence and innovation in healthcare solutions
